TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter) 將 物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和 「 實作型別轉換子 >。For more information about type converters, see the base class and "Implementing a Type Converter". > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立的執行個體類別。You should never create an instance of the class. 請改為呼叫方法。Instead, call the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

public: CursorConverter();

param.name: context

span.span: A formatter context.

param.span: 這個物件可用來擷取環境的其他相關資訊，而這個轉換器就是從這個環境叫用的。

span.span: This object can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.

span.span: Also, properties on the context object may also return .
The type you wish to convert from.

summary.span: 判斷這個轉換子是否可以將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

span.span: Determines if this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of the converter.

returns.span: 如果這個物件可以執行轉換，則為 。

span.span: if this object can perform the conversion.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CanConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, destinationType As Type) As Boolean

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: destinationType
param.span: ，表示要轉換為何種目標型別。

span.span: A that represents the type you wish to convert to.

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否可以使用內容將物件轉換成指定的目的型別。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

para.span: 請覆寫這個方法以提供您自己的轉換需求。

span.span: Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean

param.name: context
param.span: 可以用來提供額外內容的型別描述項。

span.span: A type descriptor through which additional context may be provided.

summary.span: 判斷這個物件是否支援可從清單選取的標準值集。
